description:
• added references to CGM data simulators
  • minor update to Chase2005 preprocessor
  • update to Dubosson2008 preprocessor to only keep CGM readings (eliminates SMBG)
  • update Buckhingham2007 preprocessor to filter for data quality issues (readings too small or too large)
  • add R processor to Aleppo2017 in addition to already existing python processor
title: irinagain/Awesome-CGM: Updated release of public CGM datasets with simulators and enhanced processing
